newsitem.title: UK: North Sea diffs slow to reflect sharp Brent gains.
newsitem.headline: North Sea diffs slow to reflect sharp Brent gains.

text.p: Paper Brent heaved further away from recent lows on Thursday, but the forward market's renewed strength was barely visible in differentials for North Sea physical grades, traders said.
"There are still a couple of weak (physical) sellers out there so we've yet to see (Brent gains) reflected in grade differentials," said one North Sea equity holder.
Oct Brent paper made sharp gains to stand up 50 cents up at $20.72 by mid-afternoon.
Sep/Oct Brent was out almost 10 cents on the day so far trading at +58 cents.
